actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the Affirmative Action in District Government Employment Act.

summary.text: Disapproves of the Affirmative Action in District Government Employment Act (Act 1-87), passed by the Council of the District of Columbia and transmitted to the Congress on March 4, 1976.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the Affirmative Action in District Government Employment Act.
